Desc: "The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

Talent.Name: Dunyarzad
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3103}Companion Support Card:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die (once per Round).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3103}Companion Support Card:</color>Draw 1 random {SPRITE_PRESET#3103}Companion Support Card from your deck (once per match).
